      • loadTestCase

        void loadTestCase(String testCaseName)
                  throws TestHarnessException
        This function attempts to load the test case with the specified name
        Parameters:
        testCaseName - The test case to load
        Throws:
        TestHarnessException - The exception thrown if the test case cannot be loaded

      • runTests

      • delegateToTestCase

        void delegateToTestCase(String delegateTestCaseName,
                      String delegateTestCaseLoader)
                        throws TestHarnessException
        This function attempts to delegate flow to the specified test case loaded using the specified TestCaseLoader
        Parameters:
        delegateTestCaseName - The name of the test case to load
        delegateTestCaseLoader - The name of TestCaseLoader to load the specified test case with
        Throws:
        TestHarnessException - Thrown if the specifed test case cannot be loaded
